Text.val: Author : Asaf Kehati
24.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
22.02.2012 GB SCR17135 Used the max DCLC_DATESTARTLEGALCOLL in all SQL query
24.01.2012 GB SCR16979 Changed calculation for the PO.New_Invoice_After/Before_Stop
19.12.2011 GB SCR16979 Rebuilding this program (see SCR for more details)
09.12.2011 GB SCR16956 Added the V.COLLECTED and changed calculation for PO.Real_Balance so there was
PO.Real_Balance = DCLC_INITIALBALANCEC + v.NEW_INVOICE_after_stop – v.PAYMENTS I changed it in the
PO.Real_Balance = DCLC_INITIALBALANCEC + DCLC_NEW_INVOICES – V.COLLECTED
13.10.2011 GB SCR16515 Changed calculation for the PO.Real_Balance
03.10.2011 GB SCR16515 Changed calculation of the PO.Real_Balance
08.06.2011 GB SCR16515 Changed where clause in the step 4
07.04.2011 GB SCR16338 Changed calculation for the PO.Real_Balance
06.01.2010 GB Extended selection in Step 3 with INVO_SCHT_NO = 0
27.05.2008 AK Change in the calculation of PO.Real_Balance
18.05.2008 AK SCR13629 change the claculation of v.Payment(DCLC_EXTERNAL_PAIDC)
16.05.2008 AK SCR13624 change the calculation of new-invoices and compensation
16.04.2008 AK SCR13548 change the claculation of Paid amount in step 1
04.04.2008 AK SCR13519 change the claculation of Compensation in step 2
13.03.2008 AK SCR13457 add condition - or INVOICENO='SU' to the update of
v.COMPENSATION
Calculation of PO.New_Invoice_After/Before_Stop
If DCLC_DATE_INVOICE_STOP is null
If DCLC_DATE_INVOICE_STOP is not null
Calculation of PO.Compensation_Payments
Calculation of PO.Delcredere_Payments
Calculation of PO.Total_payments
PO.Total_payments = V.SUMPAYMENTSAFTERLEGALCOLL - V.SUMREINSURANCE + DCLC_EXTERNAL_PAIDC +
Calculation of PO.Real_Balance
V.COLLECTED = V.SUMPAYMENTSAFTERLEGALCOLL - V.SUMREINSURANCE if DCLC_DATEENDLEGALCOLL is null
V.COLLECTED = DCLC_ENDPAIDC if DCLC_DATEENDLEGALCOLL <> null
PO.Real_Balance = DCLC_INITIALBALANCEC + DCLC_NEW_INVOICES - V.COLLECTED

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum (INVO_AINITIALC) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/INVO where INVO_DEBC_NO = :2 and INVO_BOOKINGDATE > ':4' and :3 and not(INVO_SCHEDULEDATE is null) and INVO_SCHT_NO > 0 and INVO_INVOICENO <> 'SU'
select cast (sum (BTPC_AMOUNTCURRC) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/BTPC where BTPC_DEBC_NO = :2 and BTPC_DATCASHREPORT >= ':4' and BTPC_BTCH_BATCHCODE = ':3'
select cast (sum (INVO_AACTUALC) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/INVO where INVO_DEBC_NO = :2 and INVO_INVOICENO between '99000' and '99999' and INVO_SCHT_NO = 0
select cast (sum (BTPC_AMOUNTCURRC) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/BTPC where BTPC_DEBC_NO = :2 and BTPC_DATCASHREPORT >= ':4' and BTPC_BTCH_BATCHCODE <> ':3'
select cast (sum (BPIV_AMOUNTCURRC) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/BPIV where BPIV_DEBC_NO = :2 and BPIV_CASHREPORTDATE >= ':4' and BPIV_PAYMENTCODE = :3
